Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Relates to contracts for the transportation of school children
Summary: Requires contracts for the transportation of school children in a city of at least one million inhabitants to contain provisions for the retention or preference in hiring of school bus workers.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to contracts for the transportation of school children
